      • addNoreLikeThis

        public void addNoreLikeThis(java.lang.String id)
        Prefer songs that are similar to the given song ID. Song ID can be 'last' to use the more recently returned song.
        Parameters:
        id - the song ID or 'last'

      • addNoreLikeThis

        public void addNoreLikeThis(java.lang.String id,
                   int boost)
        Prefer songs that are similar to the given song ID. Song ID can be 'last' to use the more recently returned song.
        Parameters:
        id - the song ID or 'last'
        boost - an integer between 0 and 5

      • addLessLikeThis

        public void addLessLikeThis(java.lang.String id)
        Prefer songs that are least similar to the given song ID. Song ID can be 'last' to use the more recently returned song.
        Parameters:
        id - the song ID or 'last'

      • addLessLikeThis

        public void addLessLikeThis(java.lang.String id,
                   int boost)
        Prefer songs that are least similar to the given song ID. Song ID can be 'last' to use the more recently returned song.
        Parameters:
        id - the song ID or 'last'
        boost - an integer between 0 and 5

      • setAdventurousness

        public void setAdventurousness(float val)
        adjust the adventurousness of the session. A value of 0 means no adventurousness, only known and preferred music will be played. A value of 1 means high adventurousness, mostly unknown music will be played. This parameter only applies to catalog and catalog-radio type playlists.
        Parameters:
        val - the adventurousness - avalue between 0 and 1

      • setVariety

        public void setVariety(float val)
        adjust the variety of the session. A higher number will allow for more variety in the artists.
        Parameters:
        val - the variety - a value between 0 and 1

        Steer towards artists that match the given description
        Parameters:
        term - the term to boost
        boost - the boost
